commit message: Added an activity to display recorded waypoints
Fixed a crash when accessing waypoint list just after stop tracking.
Fixed a but on timestamp format (Thanks B. Sieper)
Added a Toast to inform user that a waypoint was recorded
Added a Toast to inform user that a waypoint was recorded
Prevent crash if logging a waypoint with null location

Added a screen to display waypoints.
Fixed a bug in timestamp format in GPX file.
Minor UI changes and bug fixing.
